# jobTitle

**Instance Property**

The custom title of the print job.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var jobTitle: String? { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **jobTitle**: The print job title. The receiver makes its own copy of the specified string.

## Discussion

Assigning a title with this method overrides the job title provided by the printing view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/printJobTitle] method. Specifying `nil` for the `jobTitle` parameter causes the receiver to once again take its title from the printing view.

## Related Documentation

- **printJobTitle**: The view’s print job title.

## Modifying the User Interface

- **showsPrintPanel**: A Boolean value that determines whether the print operation displays a print panel.
- **showsProgressPanel**: A Boolean value that determines whether the print operation displays a progress panel.
- **printPanel**: The print panel object to use during the operation.
- **pdfPanel**: The PDF panel object to use during the operation.
